author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-One! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Scott Hadly is an all-around game designer with his own take on the Mech Genre! Sculpting his own Diesel-Punk mechs with the support of Patreon and his Tribe on MyMiniFactory, he's crowdfunding the last push to make his fully digital game fully flesh-out. Set on kitchen-table sized boards teams of 3-9 'Rigs' battling it out in a post-Smogfall world, Of Oil & Iron slides into that narrow niche of Diesel-Fueled genre with a bit of crunch. Let's dive in!

Check out the website in  HERE: https://www.ofoilandiron.com/

STLS available on MMF HERE: https://www.myminifactory.com/users/Scoutsifer

Check out the crowdfund HERE: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ofoilandiron/of-oil-and-iron
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 041 - OF OIL & IRON  by Scott Hadley
